summary: Betas and in-progress snapshots for the Hunterborn mod.
descriptionHtml:
[b]IMPORTANT:[/b] If you found this page looking for the MAIN, NON-BETA Hunterborn mod, go here instead:Â [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33201/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33201/[/url]

Please use the Posts tab on this mod's page for discussion of beta bugs, suggestions, etc.

Always use a clean save when testing a new beta build. The builds will not always necessarily include a "beta" designation, so I recommend a full uninstall of the beta when it releases, or NMM may not recognize the difference.
author: dragonsong
